select i.* , p.production_id, p.item_code, p.item_name, p.item_name_cn, p.specification , v.vendor_name from inv_inventory i left join pro_production p on p.item_code = i.item_code left join pur_vendor v on v.vendor_id = i.vendor_id
i.status = 0
AND (i.item_code like CONCAT('%',#{searchValue},'%' ) or i.batch like CONCAT('%',#{searchValue},'%' ) or p.item_name like CONCAT('%',#{searchValue},'%' ) or p.item_name_cn like CONCAT('%',#{searchValue},'%' ))

select inv.max_sn as sn, inv.item_code, inv.batch, inv.sum_quantity as quantity, inv.vendor_id, p.production_id, p.item_name, p.item_name_cn, p.specification , v.vendor_name from (select max(i.sn) as max_sn, i.item_code, i.batch, sum(i.quantity) as sum_quantity, i.vendor_id from inv_inventory i where i.status=0 and i.quantity>=0.001 group by i.item_code, i.batch, i.vendor_id) inv left join pro_production p on p.item_code = inv.item_code left join pur_vendor v on v.vendor_id = inv.vendor_id where inv.sum_quantity>=0.001
AND ( inv.item_code like CONCAT('%',#{searchValue},'%' ) or inv.batch like CONCAT('%',#{searchValue},'%' ) or p.item_name like CONCAT('%',#{searchValue},'%' ) or p.item_name_cn like CONCAT('%',#{searchValue},'%' ) )

select i.* , p.production_id, p.item_code, p.item_name, p.item_name_cn, p.specification , v.vendor_name from inv_inventory i left join pro_production p on p.item_code = i.item_code left join pur_vendor v on v.vendor_id = i.vendor_id where i.status = 0 and sn = #{sn}

select i.sn, i.item_code, i.batch, i.warehouse, i.position, i.quantity, i.vendor_id, v.vendor_name from inv_inventory i left join pur_vendor v on v.vendor_id = i.vendor_id
i.status = 0
AND i.item_code = #{itemCode} AND i.batch like CONCAT('%',#{batch},'%' ) and i.quantity>=0.001

select i.sn, i.item_code, i.batch, i.warehouse, i.position, i.quantity, i.price_purchase, i.price_fob_ontario, date_format(i.stock_in_date ,'%Y-%m-%d' ) as stock_in_date from inv_inventory i
i.status = 0 AND i.item_code = #{itemCode} AND i.batch = #{batch} AND i.vendor_id = #{vendorId} and i.quantity>=0.001

select i.sn, i.item_code, i.batch, i.warehouse, i.position, i.quantity, i.price_purchase, i.price_fob_ontario, date_format(i.stock_in_date ,'%Y-%m-%d' ) as stock_in_date from inv_inventory i
i.status = 0 AND i.item_code = #{itemCode} and i.quantity>=0.001
